title: S7E17 – "The Many Faces of Fear" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Michael Whitehouse, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about self-righteous rebellion, eerie auditions, cryptic cultures, and dark descents. 

                         
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
